title: Week 2 Preview: The Ravens Try to Upset the Chiefs, Bills Bounceback Game, and the Rest of the Week 2 Slate
description:
Benjamin, Kaelen, and Steven start their preview of Week 2 by discussing their games of the week, including the AFC battle between Kansas City and Baltimore (2:20). Then they move on to some of the other intriguing matchups, such as Steelers-Raiders, Colts-Rams, and more (41:50). Then they wrap up with Gimme a Reason and discuss the rest of the games on the Week 2 slate (1:00:22).
Hosts: Benjamin Solak, Kaelen Jones, Steven Ruiz
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
